Module SC2002
Package fsmjdoc

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
fsmjdoc.Customer
public class Customer extends Object
Represents a customer in the system who can browse menus, select branches, and manage their cart.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Customer()
    Constructs a new Customer with an empty cart.
